    • Method Detail

      • createWebView

        static android.webkit.WebView createWebView(android.content.Context applicationContext)

        Creates the shared webView used throughout the lifetime of the TurbolinksSession.

        Parameters:
        applicationContext - An application context.
        Returns:
        The shared WebView.

      • encodeUrl

        static java.lang.String encodeUrl(java.lang.String originalUrl)

        Encodes URLs so they are properly escaped, specifically for Javascript calls. Liberally borrowed from: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3286067/url-encoding-in-android/8962879#8962879

        Parameters:
        originalUrl - Original URL string.
        Returns:
        Encoded, escaped URL string.

      • getContentFromAssetFile

        static java.lang.String getContentFromAssetFile(android.content.Context context,
                                                java.lang.String filePath)
                                         throws java.io.IOException

        Gets the base64-encoded string of a local asset file (typically a Javascript or HTML file)

        Parameters:
        context - An activity context.
        filePath - Local file path relative to the main/src directory.
        Returns:
        A base-64 encoded string of the file contents.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Typically if a file cannot be found or read in.

      • injectTurbolinksBridge

        static void injectTurbolinksBridge(TurbolinksSession turbolinksSession,
                                   android.content.Context context,
                                   android.webkit.WebView webView)

        Injects Javascript into the webView.

        Parameters:
        turbolinksSession - The TurbolinksSession.
        context - Any Android context.
        webView - The shared webView.

      • runJavascript

        static void runJavascript(android.content.Context context,
                          android.webkit.WebView webView,
                          java.lang.String functionName,
                          java.lang.Object... params)

        JSONifies any arbitrary number of params and runs the the Javascript function in the webView.

        Parameters:
        context - An activity context.
        webView - The shared webView.
        functionName - The Javascript function name only (no parenthesis or parameters).
        params - A comma delimited list of parameter values.

      • runJavascriptRaw

        static void runJavascriptRaw(android.content.Context context,
                             android.webkit.WebView webView,
                             java.lang.String javascript)

        Runs raw Javascript that's passed in. You are responsible for encoding/escaping the function call.

        Parameters:
        context - An activity context.
        webView - The shared webView.
        javascript - The raw Javascript to be executed, fully escaped/encoded in advance.

      • runOnMainThread

        static void runOnMainThread(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.Runnable runnable)

        Executes a given runnable on the main thread.

        Parameters:
        context - An activity context.
        runnable - A runnable to execute on the main thread.
